A true vintage for pleasure

With wide ranges in temperature and rainfall, 2012 was a challenging year for the vineyard. After favorable conditions returned mid-July, this vintage, though off to an early start, proved to be late in reaching its optimum maturity beginning on 8th October. Tasting after tasting, 2012 never ceases to amaze and charm us.
